channel.title: Version 5.18 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 5.18.0 (2023-07-27) Enhancements [feature][change] shorrrtcodes: add more deprecat'n warnings #598 [feature][change] shorrrtcodes: change context parameter t' plank if called as partial #595 [feature] siteparam: support nested parameters an' text formatt'n #590 [feature][change] a11y: improve when tabb'n through links #581 Fixes [bug] openapi: inherit RTL sett'n from Cap'n Hugo rrrambl'n #600 [bug] 404: fix display 'n RTL #597 [bug] highlight: fix posit'n o' copy-to-clipboard button 'n RTL #594 [bug] openapi: fix spell'n #593 [bug] search: fix typo 'n output format #591 [bug] tabs: fix tab select'n by groupid #582 [bug] theme: restore compat wit' Cap'n Hugo 0.95.0 #580 [bug][change] theme: improve display o' links #577
